show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content:
Are you a victim of medical authoritarianism? My guest is New York City clinical psychologist Sarton Weinraub.
Â  Learn how Sarton empowers patients to take control over their lives and their medical care, including how to manage their withdrawal from psychiatric medication.
His views and his work empowers clients and professionals, and everyone concerned about improving therapy and methods of drug withdrawal.
